did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Philosophy records
did.abstract: This small collection contains various documents that shed some light on the history of the Philosophy Department at Xavier University. The collection consists mainly of minutes, correspondence and reports.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection is chiefly documents generated by the Philosophy Department at Xavier University. Some pamphlets written by department faculty member William Hetherington, S.J. are also included.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is arranged into folders mainly in chronological order.
